articles.author: Shivam Verma
articles.title: What would happen if someone dies in space? - DNA India
articles.description: In space, there is no atmosphere, so a body would not decompose as it would on Earth
articles.content: In direct sunlight, it could reach very high temperatures, while in the shadow of a spacecraft, it could become extremely cold.
